name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frank LAWSON, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frank LAWSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Hart, Childs, Hepburn, Ross & Putnam, Richard D. Maimed, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 456
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Frank LAWSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 14, 1977.
Decided June 3, 1977.
Hart, Childs, Hepburn, Ross & Putnam, Richard D. Maimed, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
